a_companies_house_account_is_used_to_sig: A Companies House account is used to sign in to:
the Companies House register - sometimes known as ‘Find and update company information’, or the ‘Companies House service’
some of our online services, such as ‘Upload a document to Companies House’
create_sign_in_details: create sign in details for Companies House (opens in a new tab)
if_the_user_does_not_have_a_companies_ho: If the user does not have a Companies House account
the_user_will_need_to_do_this: The user will need to do this before you add them.
to_add_someone_as_a_user: To add someone as a user, they must already have a Companies House account. This is different to a WebFiling account.
